Question: In the context of the movie 'Fifty Shades Darker' released in 2016, what is the relationship between 'Fifty Shades Darker' and 'Fifty Shades Freed'?
Options:

B. Fifty Shades Darker is a sequel to Fifty Shades Freed.
C. Fifty Shades Darker and Fifty Shades Freed will both be adapted into films.
D. Fifty Shades Freed is a prequel to Fifty Shades Darker.
Answer: Fifty Shades Darker and Fifty Shades Freed will both be adapted into films.
